pets.name: Buddy
pets.health: Healthy and very active, loves outdoor play.
pets.grooming: Regular brushing and occasional baths to maintain coat health.
pets.exercise: Daily walks and playtime for at least 30 minutes.
pets.vaccination: Rabies, parvovirus, distemper, and kennel cough.

pets.name: Mittens
pets.health: Healthy, enjoys naps and clean fur.
pets.grooming: Brush fur weekly; trim nails and clean ears occasionally.
pets.exercise: Play sessions with toys and climbing structures.
pets.vaccination: Rabies, feline distemper, and feline herpesvirus.

pets.name: Sunny
pets.grooming: Regular feather preening; occasional misting or baths.
pets.exercise: Flying time and mental stimulation with toys.
pets.vaccination: Typically none required; annual vet check recommended.

pets.name: Peep
pets.grooming: Provide clean water for bathing daily.
pets.exercise: Flying inside the cage or safe open area.

pets.name: Goldie
pets.grooming: Keep tank clean; filter water regularly.
pets.exercise: Swimming space in a properly sized tank.
pets.vaccination: Not applicable; maintain water quality to prevent disease.

pets.name: Bubbles
pets.exercise: Allow free swimming space; provide decorations to explore.
pets.vaccination: Not required; ensure good water conditions.

pets.name: Spike
pets.health: Healthy, sheds smoothly and eats well.
pets.grooming: Keep terrarium clean; provide shedding support.
pets.exercise: Climbing and exploring branches or rocks.
pets.vaccination: Not required; regular vet checks recommended.

pets.name: Shelly
pets.health: Active, strong shell and healthy appetite.
pets.exercise: Swimming and walking space in tank or outdoors.
pets.vaccination: Not necessary; maintain clean habitat to prevent infections.

pets.name: Clover
pets.grooming: Brush coat weekly; trim hooves regularly.
pets.exercise: Free grazing and open space for walking.

pets.name: Nugget
pets.exercise: Allow space for scratching and foraging.
pets.vaccination: Mareks disease and Newcastle disease vaccines.

pets.name: Pinecone
pets.exercise: Running wheel and space to explore.
pets.vaccination: Not required; regular vet visits advised.

pets.name: Whiskers
pets.grooming: Brush coat; clean ears and teeth regularly.
